Sentencas: Perovskite-type materials have been extensively investigated in the attempt to find new electrolyte materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell that work at low temperatures.
Titulo: Microstructural development and oxygen ion mobility in Sr, Ba, and Ca-doped LaAlO3 perovskites

Sentencas: Among these materials, LaAlO3 stands out for presenting considerable ionic conductivity when adequately doped.
Titulo: Microstructural development and oxygen ion mobility in Sr, Ba, and Ca-doped LaAlO3 perovskites

Sentencas: In this work, pure and Sr, Ba, and Ca-doped LaAlO3 were studied.
Titulo: Microstructural development and oxygen ion mobility in Sr, Ba, and Ca-doped LaAlO3 perovskites

Sentencas: The powders were prepared by solid state reaction.
Titulo: Microstructural development and oxygen ion mobility in Sr, Ba, and Ca-doped LaAlO3 perovskites

Sentencas: Microstructural, structural and electrical conductivity of sintered samples were analyzed by scanning electron microscopy, X-ray diffraction and impedance spectroscopy, respectively.
Titulo: Microstructural development and oxygen ion mobility in Sr, Ba, and Ca-doped LaAlO3 perovskites

Sentencas: Among the different kinds of dopants, Sr-doped sample presented the higher conductivity, for both the grain (at 800 degrees C) and total (at 800 degrees C) conductivity.
Titulo: Microstructural development and oxygen ion mobility in Sr, Ba, and Ca-doped LaAlO3 perovskites

Sentencas: In all doped samples, the total conductivity is controlled by the grain boundary, i.e., the grain boundary is more resistive than the grain, and the microstructures are heterogeneous and the degree of heterogeneity is determined by the dopant.
Titulo: Microstructural development and oxygen ion mobility in Sr, Ba, and Ca-doped LaAlO3 perovskites
